profile:
In short form, yes we are open!  In long form, COVID-19 has changed the way that many people interact with each other.  For Acorn that means that we will continue to do estimates and jobs while maintaining our physical distance as well as sanitizing as necessary.  We will be watching for Dr. Bonnie Henry's health updates, and adjust our interactions accordingly.  So in her words, be kind, be calm and be safe.

Acorn Wood Floors continues a family tradition started in 1959. This company is a product of the combined experiences of the Teljeur family and its background in the flooring industry. While our product line will suit many budget ranges, we still carry only first line, fully warrantied, dependable products. The majority of our product selection consists of North American and European brands.  

As well as new installations, Acorn is known within the industry for its excellence in restorations, refinishing and extending of exisiting wood floors.  Refinishing wood flooring is no longer the intrusive smelly dust storm of the past.  With the combination of our Dust Collection Systems and our use of durable, environmentally friendly water-based finishes, the refinishing process doesn't turn your life upside down.

profile:
Surface Deep Solutions is committed to sustainable construction and to minimizing the impact we have on the environment. High quality cosmetic repair is a sustainable option, it’s far more environmentally friendly, not to mention cost-effective, to repair rather than replace – and that goes for both refurbishment and new build projects.

How we can help
Replacements cost more in terms of money, time and labour, and can significantly delay delivery of a project. Our cosmetic repairs help keep projects on time, on budget, and improve waste management, helping to achieve and maintain sustainable construction.


Save Money
Instead of replacing, refinish your products to save YOU money!  

Repair all types of surfaces
We can repair all types of surfaces including granite, laminate, fiberglass, enamel, cast iron, metal or wood.  

Friendly Staff
Built on a solid foundation of experience, meticulous attention to detail, superb workmanship and exceptional customer service

ECO-Friendly
We help prevent old bathtubs, tiles, counter-tops and sinks from entering landfill

Why Choose to Repair
Eliminate the expense and the disruption of replacement work with top-notch repair and restoration services from Surface Deep Solutions. By doing so, you could take advantage of up to 80% in substantial savings. Contact Us for your FREE estimate.

Our Values
Quality – We are committed to providing high quality service for all of our customers.
Creativity – We are continuously inventing new ways of repairing surfaces that are both cost effective and environmentally friendly.
Workmanship – We thrive on providing high quality workmanship for all of our customers.
services:
We can help you Repair Instead of Replace. To save YOU money!

We provide services for YOU, manufacturers, realtors, restoration, development and management companies.
 

We specialize in many types of surface  repairs such as:
 

• Counter tops/granite,laminate. Stains, chips and scratches.

• Tubs/sinks/showers whether it is on fiberglass, enamel or cast iron.

• Vinyl window casings/ sliding glass door vinyl frames. Chips,cracks and holes.

• Appliances – Stove/oven chips.

• Metal/wood doors. Dents or scratches.

• Elevator panels, laminate, lino and hardwood floor

profile:
Core Garage Solutions  is Vancouver’s leading floor and resurfacing company. We combine industry leading surface coating products, experience and dedication to deliver the absolute best flooring solutions for your project. From residential garages to large industrial complexes we can handle floor surfacing projects of any size.

We offer several flooring and re-surfacing solutions including solid epoxy, polyaspartic and urethane coatings. We can help you choose which coating will offer the best solution for your project. We always offer free quotes for projects of any size.

Contact us today to see how we can help turn your dream floor into a reality.

profile:
We’re S class tiling and residential services and we've been helping homeowners renovate and maintain their properties/living space in the lower mainland since the beginning of 2021. 

We believe in offering fair prices with exceptional work in order to help our clients to not get overcharged in this competitive market. 

We love helping homeowners improve the look of their homes. Whether it be tiling, flooring, painting or just a simple gutter clean or tree trim, we are always excited to enhance the project at hand. 

My dad always had a passion for renovation jobs but never took it seriously and only did it on the side for many years. He would continuously receive positive feedback regarding the jobs he did but didn’t have the “tools” to take it to the next level. Once I graduated high school and got the “tools” I decided to help my dad and truly allow him to share his gift with the world. 

We look forward to continuing to provide our services across the lower mainland for years to come. Our goal is to grow into one of the largest tile installation companies in the lower mainland and provide exceptional compensation for our employees to help them live good lives. 

We’ll offer any free estimations and answer any questions you have. Even after we give you a price or we’re on the job, if you have any concerns, we won’t hesitate to address them.
services: Tile - Ceramic and Porcelain Install, Replace, & Repair. Wood Flooring - Install, Replace, & Repair. Wood Flooring - Refinish. Laminate Wood or Stone Flooring - Install, Replace, & Repair. Wood Stairs and Railing - Install, Replace, & Repair. Vinyl or Linoleum Sheet Flooring or Tiles - Install, Replace, & Repair. Drywall, Mudding, Taping & Painting. Tree Trimming, Gutter Cleaning, & Pressurewashing.

profile:
Hurricane Coatings proudly provides surface coating solutions to residential and commercial clients in Metro Vancouver and the Fraser Valley in British Columbia. 

We are a family owned business and strive to be the best in the business. At Hurricane Coatings, we stand behind our workmanship, providing a 10 year warranty for your peace of mind.

Services:
-Epoxy & Polyaspartic Coatings (available in a solid, flake or metallic finish)
-Coating Removal
-Diamond Grinding
-Crack Repair
-Garage Floors, Stairs, Driveways, Exterior Decks, Man Caves, Basement Suites, Boiler Rooms, and more! 

Contact us today to book your FREE estimate!
